name: Hell Slayer
description:
As the flames of war consume the world and the forces of hell rise to claim victory, humanity hangs by a thread. You are the Hell Slayer, a warrior driven solely by vengeance to destroy the demonic lords.

Hell Slayer is a hardcore Survivor-like. Each run, you'll need to survive for 25 minutes while fighting off endless hordes of foes, each more devious than the last. As you fight, you'll earn experience points and level up, giving you the opportunity to choose from many upgrades to tailor your build. Every weapon has multiple upgrade paths unique to them, will you prefer area of effect or raw damage? Attack speed or penetration? The choice is yours.

As you explore the scorched earth, you will find new weapons and trinkets for your divine armory. Here you pour the soul essence you collected into permanent upgrades for the next run. Steel your body, meditate and imbue your weapons. Only God can help you now.
